name: Clean Energy Technologies, Inc.
description: Clean Energy Technologies, Inc. specializes in innovative solutions that promote sustainability and reduce carbon emissions. Established in 2009, the company focuses on developing and commercializing advanced technologies that convert waste heat to energy, which helps industrial customers improve energy efficiency and reduce operational costs. Their flagship product, the Clean Energy Technologies' Heat Recovery System, captures waste heat from industrial processes and converts it into usable energy, significantly lowering greenhouse gas emissions. The company is also committed to expanding into new markets, including renewable energy projects and carbon capture technologies. With a mission to create a cleaner, more sustainable environment, Clean Energy Technologies aims to lead the transition towards a low-carbon economy. They strive to provide cutting-edge energy solutions that not only enhance energy efficiency but also contribute to global sustainability goals.

seo.meta_title: Clean Energy Technologies, Inc. | Sustainable Energy Solutions
seo.meta_description: Explore Clean Energy Technologies, Inc., a leader in sustainable energy solutions focused on waste heat recovery and carbon reduction. Discover our innovative technologies and commitment to a cleaner future.

faq.question: What does Clean Energy Technologies do?
faq.answer: Clean Energy Technologies develops and commercializes technologies that convert waste heat to energy and promote sustainability.

faq.question: Who is the CEO of Clean Energy Technologies?
faq.answer: William Z. Smith is the CEO of Clean Energy Technologies, Inc.

faq.question: Where is Clean Energy Technologies headquartered?
faq.answer: The company is headquartered in Irvine, California, USA.

faq.question: What are the main products of Clean Energy Technologies?
faq.answer: Their main products include Heat Recovery Systems and renewable energy solutions such as solar energy systems.

faq.question: When was Clean Energy Technologies founded?
faq.answer: Clean Energy Technologies was founded in 2009.
